classRec.name: ColorMatrixUtil
classRec.description:
A utility class for ColorMatrixFilters that can be easily applied to a Layer or Map.

heatMapLayer.filters = [ ColorMatrixUtil.blackAndWhite ];

method.name: blackAndWhite
method.description: A black and white ColorMatrixFilter.

method.name: dusk
method.description: The color matrix array values for a dusk ColorMatrixFilter.

classRec.name: UIComponentUtil
classRec.description: This utility can be used to populate a DropDownList component's dataProvider.

method.name: getComboBoxDataProvider
method.description: Utility function to an array collection of objects {data:-1, label:"Select a type"} that can be used as the dataProvider for a ComboBox.
method.param: parseLabels The string of labels to use "label1,label2,label3".
parseData The string of data to use "data1,data2,data3".
promptString The first label in the combobox that the user will see. If you don't set the prompt string the first object will be {data:-1, "--Select a type--"}
method.return: An ArrayCollection that can be used as the dataProvider of a ComboBox

method.name: delimiter
method.param: value The delimiter to use. A comma, pipe, or custom delimiter. The default is comma.

classRec.name: HeatMapGradientDict
classRec.description: Contains pregenerated arrays that are used by the HeatMap's internal gradientArray, when setting the theme on the ArcGISHeatMapLayer. The fillCustomPaletteMap method may also be used to populate the "CUSTOM_TYPE" theme using an array of color values.

method.name: fillCustomPaletteMap
method.param: colors The array of colors to be used to fill in the heatmap.
alpha The transparency of the custom palette.

method.name: gradientArray
method.description: Returns the appropriate gradient array based upon the type requested.
method.param: type The constant value representing the heatmap theme.
method.return: The gradient array for the givent heatmap theme.

field.name: CUSTOM_TYPE
field.description: Defines the value of the type property of a custom gradient array.

field.name: RAINBOW_TYPE
field.description: Defines the value of the type property of a rainbow gradient array.

field.name: RED_WHITE_BLUE_TYPE
field.description: Defines the value of the type property of a red white blue gradient array.

field.name: THERMAL_TYPE
field.description: Defines the value of the type property of a thermal gradient array.

field.name: WEATHER_RADAR_TYPE
field.description: Defines the value of the type property of a weather radar gradient array.

classRec.name: HeatMapEvent
classRec.description: Represents event objects that are specific to the ArcGISHeatMapLayer.

method.name: HeatMapEvent
method.description: Creates a new HeatMapEvent.
method.param: type The event type; indicates the action that triggered the event.

field.name: REFRESH_END
field.description: Defines the value of the type property of an refreshEnd event object.

field.name: REFRESH_START
field.description: Defines the value of the type property of an refreshStart event object.

field.name: count
field.description: The number of features used in generating the heatmap layer.

field.name: featureSet
field.description: The featureset returned by the query issued by the ArcGISHeatMapLayer.

classRec.name: HeatMapPoint
classRec.description: A location to be used in calculating the ArcGISHeatMapLayer.

method.name: HeatMapPoint
method.description: Creates a new MapPoint object.
method.param: spatialReference The spatial reference of the point.

classRec.name: ArcGISHeatMapLayer
classRec.description:
Allows you to generate a client-side dynamic heatmap on the fly through querying a layer resource (points only) exposed by the ArcGIS Server REST API (available in ArcGIS Server 9.3 and above). This layer also supports time through setting the time extent directly on the layer, or through the map the layer is contained within. It is also aware of extent changes and time extent events triggered by its parent containing map, these events will cause the layer to be re-queried and the heatmap generated again.

Note that ArcGISHeatMapLayer, like all layers, extend UIComponent and thus include basic mouse events, for example: click, mouseOut, mouseOver, and mouseDown, as well as other events like show and hide, and general properties, such as alpha and visible.

MXML usage of ArcGISHeatMapLayer: <esri:Map> <layers:ArcGISHeatMapLayer id="heatMapLayer" outFields="*" url="http://sampleserver3.arcgisonline.com/ArcGIS/rest/services/Earthquakes/Since_1970/MapServer/0"/> </esri:Map>
classRec.see: http://developers.arcgis.com/en/flex/sample-code/heatmap-weighted.htm Live sample - Weighted HeatMap layer (uses calculator functions)
http://esri.github.io/heatmap-widget-flex Live sample - ArcGIS Viewer for Flex HeatMap Widget

method.name: ArcGISHeatMapLayer
method.description: Creates a new ArcGISHeatMapLayer object.
method.param: url URL to the ArcGIS Server REST resource that represents a point layer in map service or feature service.
proxyURL The URL to proxy the request through.
token Token for accessing a secure dynamic ArcGIS service.

method.name: parseURL
method.description: Split the main service url into its MapServer or FeatureServer part and then the layer id in the map service or feature service.

method.name: clusterCount
method.description: The cluster count.

method.name: clusterMaxWeight
method.description: The maximum weight of the cluster.

method.name: clusterSize
method.description: The cluster size.

method.name: densityRadius
method.description: The density radius. This controls the size of the heat radius for a given point.

method.name: featureCount
method.description: The number of point features used to create the heatmap layer.

method.name: featureSet
method.description: The current set of features being used to generate the heatmap.

method.name: layerDetails
method.description: The detailed information from the ArcGIS web service layer used to generate the heatmap.
method.return: The LayerDetails of the point layer being queried in the map or feature service.

method.name: outFields
method.description: Attribute fields to include in the FeatureSet returned in the HeatMapEvent.

method.name: proxyURL
method.description: The URL to proxy the request through.

method.name: theme
method.description: The "named" color scheme used to generate the client-side heatmap layer.

method.name: timeExtent
method.description: The time instant or the time extent to query, this is usually set internally through a time extent change event when the map time changes and not set directly.

method.name: token
method.description: Token for accessing a secure ArcGIS service.

method.name: url
method.description: URL of the point layer in feature or map service that will be used to generate the heatmap.

method.name: useAMF
method.description: Use AMF for executing the query. This is the preferred method, but the server must support it. Requires the server to be ArcGIS Server 10.0 or above, set to false if using earlier server versions. When useAMF is true, the BaseTask properties concurrency, requestTimeout and showBusyCursor are ignored.

method.name: where
method.description: A where clause for the query, refer to the Query class in the ArcGIS API for Flex documentation.

method.name: clusterIndexCalculator
method.description: The function to use to calculate the cluster index. If not set the heatmap layer will default to the internal function.

method.name: clusterRadiusCalculator
method.description: The function to use to calculate the cluster radius. If not set the heatmap layer will default to the internal function.

method.name: clusterWeightCalculator
method.description: The function to use to calculate the cluster weight. If not set the heatmap layer will default to the internal function.

method.name: featureIndexCalculator
method.description: The function to use to calculate the index used to retrieve colors from the gradient dictionary. If not set the heatmap layer will default to the internal function.

method.name: featureRadiusCalculator
method.description: The function to use to calculate the density radius. If not set the heatmap layer will default to the internal function.

classRec.description: The default skin class for the HeatMapThemeView Spark ButtonBar component. The buttons on the ButtonBar component use the ButtonBarLastButtonSkin, ButtonBarFirstButtonSkin and ButtonBarMiddleButtonSkin classes.

classRec.name: HeatMapThemeView
classRec.description: The default component used for changing the heatmap widget layer's theme or color.

method.name: themeLabel
method.description: The title or label for the theme button bar.

method.name: theme
method.description: Used to set the currently active theme on the button bar component.
method.param: value The named constant representing the theme.

field.name: themeButtonBar
field.description: ButtonBar component used to create the user interface for changing the heat map theme color.

packageRec.name: com.esri.ags.samples.components.null
packageRec.description: Generated by mxmlc 4.0 Package: com.esri.ags.samples.components Class: ProgressMessage Source: /Users/lheberlie/Git/Development/FlexViewer/heatmap-widget-flex/repo/src/com/esri/ags/samples/components/ProgressMessage.mxml

classRec.name: ProgressMessage
classRec.description: The component used to give user feedback that the heatmap widget is busy.
